task: Create a Python function to extract the AWS region from an ARN (Amazon Resource Name)
Write a JSON schema to validate an AWS Lambda function configuration
Develop a regular expression to match valid AWS EC2 instance types (e.g., t2.micro, m5.large)
Create a Python function to convert an AWS CloudFormation template from YAML to JSON
Write a JSON object representing a basic AWS IAM policy allowing S3 read-only access to a specific bucket
